title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 106.12 - Federal credits against income tax not allowable for New York State personal income tax purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 106.12 - Federal credits against income tax not allowable for New York State personal income tax purposes

State Regulations

For Federal income tax purposes, certain credits against

Federal tax are allowed. However, such Federal credits against tax are not
allowable for New York State personal income tax purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
106.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
